long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Neon Background Themes is a Chrome extension that allows users to customize the look of their new tab page with beautiful and inspiring canvas graphics. Unlike other new tab page extensions, Neon Themes does not collect any personal data or usage information, ensuring user privacy and security. Users can enjoy a personalized browsing experience without compromising their privacy.
